channel.title: Constant Register - Quick Question
channel.description:
Hello, I logged into my server and got this weird bug:
[URL=http://www.imagebam.com/image/dfddd7147744800][IMG]http://thumbnails43.imagebam.com/14775/dfddd7147744800.jpg[/img][/URL]
All I did was add "Owner Don't Lost Items in Wild". And now it just repeats a user login. It also causes the game to crash after a minute.
I would use search but I have no clue what to look for :P
Any ideas?
P.S. - 747668 is just a random bunch of letters I used for a random user test.
--I backed up the file to it's original version and it still does this.
--It seems new profiles do not get saved to the characters folder. Not sure why.
UPDATE IMAGE: [URL=http://www.imagebam.com/image/0d0eda147756028][IMG]http://thumbnails43.imagebam.com/14776/0d0eda147756028.jpg[/img][/URL]

item.title: Constant Register - Quick Question
item.description:
@360236 wrote:

Hello, I logged into my server and got this weird bug:

All I did was add “Owner Don’t Lost Items in Wild”. And now it just repeats a user login. It also causes the game to crash after a minute.

I would use search but I have no clue what to look for

Any ideas?

P.S. - 747668 is just a random bunch of letters I used for a random user test.

–I backed up the file to it’s original version and it still does this.

–It seems new profiles do not get saved to the characters folder. Not sure why.
